mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate= NOW(), title =#{title}, `body`= #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select:
SELECT Count(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A WHERE 1
AND A.BoardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, IFNULL(SUM(RP.point),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point > 0,RP.point,0)),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point < 0,RP.point,0)),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS RP ON A.id = RP.relId AND RP.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE A.id = #{id} GROUP BY A.id
